Key Match Events: Bolivia stunned Colombia with a 1-0 victory on October 10, 2024.
Bolivia's Miguel Terceros scored the winning goal against Colombia.
Bolivia played with 10 men after 20 minutes but still secured the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia's win against Colombia has boosted their confidence ahead of facing Argentina.
Bolivia sits in one of South America's 2026 World Cup qualification spots.
Miguel Terceros has been a standout player for Bolivia, scoring his third goal of the qualifying campaign.
Post-Match Reflections: Bolivia's Diego Medina celebrated the victory against Colombia.
Bolivia hopes to continue their success in future matches to qualify for the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia moved their home games to Estadio Municipal de El Alto, achieving a perfect record of three wins out of three.
Bolivia's home stadium is located over 13,000 feet above sea level, providing a geographical advantage.
